author: Anonymous Scale
title: Pset 10 starter check expect error
question:
In the problem set 10 starter file provided, under the first question, there is a provided check-expect 
(check-expect (max-num-repeats (list "dog" "cat" "bird"
                                     "dog" "dog" "dog"
                                     "moose" "dog"))
              3)
the word "dog" repeats 5 times, should this not be equal to 5? if so, could it be possible that the autograder internal test also has this and is producing the wrong result when we submit for grading?
student_answer: It's the max number of consecutive repeats:)
